org.fishwife.jrugged

Class ServiceRetrier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fishwife.jrugged.ServiceRetrier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceWrapper

    public class ServiceRetrier
extends Object
implements ServiceWrapper
    Calls a service multiple times until the call succeeds or the maximum number of tries is exceeded. A delay can be configured between calls and that delay can be constant or configured to double between each call.
